name: infisical
tagline: A secrets management platform for centralizing environment variables securely
description: Infisical is an open source secret management platform for developers. It centralizes environment variables and secrets, provides access controls, audits and integrations with CI, and is available as both a cloud and self hosted solution.

features.title: Secrets Management
features.description: Stores application secrets such as API keys tokens and credentials

features.title: Environment Separation
features.description: Organizes secrets by environment such as development staging and production

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Restricts who can read or modify secrets using role-based permissions

features.title: Audit Logging
features.description: Records access and changes to secrets for traceability

features.title: Secret Rotation
features.description: Supports updating secrets without manual redistribution

features.title: API and CLI Access
features.description: Integrates secrets into applications and deployment workflows

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Shares secrets safely among team members

features.title: Self-Hosted Secrets Platform
features.description: Can be hosted on your own servers
